name: Blair Witch Project: Episode 1 - Rustin Parr
name_original: Blair Witch Project: Episode 1 - Rustin Parr
description:
Blair Witch Project: Episode 1 - Rustin Parr is an action-adventure game developed by Terminal Reality. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Gathering of Developers. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Blair Witch Project: Episode 1 - Rustin Parr on PC.
